00001 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00002 /// @file         CTreeGraph.h
00003 ///
00004 /// @author       Bob Buehler, Matt Dissinger, Kyle Owen
00005 ///
00006 /// @compiler     Windows: MinGW / Linux: GNU G++
00007 ///
00008 /// @project      GNAT
00009 ///
00010 /// @description  This file contains the declaration of the CTreeGraph class,
00011 ///               which stores the actual data of a tree, and the structure
00012 ///               which represents the tree nodes.
00013 ///
00014 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00015 #ifndef _CTREEGRAPH_H_
00016 #define _CTREEGRAPH_H_
00017 
00018 #include <QString>
00019 #include <QList>
00020 #include <QPoint>
00021 #include <QDataStream>
00022 
00023 struct STreeNode;
00024 
00025 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00026 /// CTreeGraph
00027 ///
00028 /// @description  The CTreeGraph class is a container for the nodes in a tree
00029 ///               graph.  It provides complete and unsecured access to its
00030 ///               attributes.
00031 ///               The CTreeGraph also encapsulates its own file I/O for both
00032 ///               saving and loading.  For image output of the tree layout see
00033 ///               the CTreeGraphRenderer.
00034 ///
00035 /// @limitations  Direct use of this class can be very dangerous.  It is
00036 ///               recommended that this class be placed inside a
00037 ///               CTreeGraphModel before interacting with it.
00038 ///
00039 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00040 class CTreeGraph
00041 {
00042 public:
00043     CTreeGraph();
00044     ~CTreeGraph();
00045 
00046     QString getFileName();
00047     STreeNode * getRootNode() const;
00048 
00049     void load( const QString &fileName = QString() );
00050     void loadHelper( STreeNode *node, QDataStream &stream );
00051 
00052     void save( const QString &fileName = QString() );
00053     void saveHelper( const STreeNode *node, QDataStream &stream );
00054 
00055     void setFileName( const QString &fileName );
00056     void setRootNode(STreeNode *node);
00057 
00058 private:
00059     //This variable is used to store a pointer to the root of the tree graph.
00060     STreeNode *m_rootNode;
00061 
00062     //This variable is used to store the current file name.
00063     QString    m_fileName;
00064 };
00065 
00066 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00067 /// STreeNode
00068 ///
00069 /// @description  The STreeNode struct publicly contains all the information
00070 ///               needed to define a node in a tree graph.
00071 ///
00072 /// @limitations  None
00073 ///
00074 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00075 struct STreeNode
00076 {
00077     STreeNode();
00078     ~STreeNode();
00079 
00080     ///This variable stores the name of the node.
00081     QString                 s_name;
00082 
00083     ///This variable stores the quiescent state of the node.
00084     bool                    s_quiescent;
00085 
00086     ///This variable stores the state value of the node.
00087     qreal                   s_value;
00088     
00089     ///This variable stores the preset history table value
00090     int                     s_history;
00091 
00092     ///This variable stores a pointer to the parent node of the node.
00093     STreeNode              *s_parent;
00094 
00095     ///This variable stores the location on the screen of the node.
00096     QPoint                  s_position;
00097 
00098     ///This variable holds a list of the child nodes of the node, sorted
00099     ///from left to right.
00100     QList<STreeNode *>      s_childList;
00101 };
00102 
00103 #endif /*_CTREEGRAPH_H_*/
